*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Barnett to Austin, July 13, 1825. Asking whether Mexican Government will repay advances which he made to Trespalacios in 1820.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mentoco River*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-13-1825">13 July 1825*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Will you do me the favor to write me and give me the infomation which I now ask of you— I see in the *location_mentioned*northern papers*/location_mentioned*, that the *person_mentioned*Mexican Government*/person_mentioned* has passed a Decree recognizing all the Public Debts of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, and will pay them all, under whatever system they were Contracted. I presume you must have this intelligence on this your self. When *person_mentioned*Genl- Trespelassis*/person_mentioned* took the command at *location_mentioned*Galveston */location_mentioned*and on the faith of his promises and for the welfare of mankind—I advanced the different *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*soldiers */person_mentioned*to the amount of about Eight hundred Dollars. I have the paper issued by the *person_mentioned*General */person_mentioned*for about four hundred Dollars. If you think this Law in the *person_mentioned*Mexican Congress*/person_mentioned* imbraces all the expenditures which I am sure they do)—I will come out *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1826">next spring*/date_mentioned* and see you, and settle in your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*.—*/p*
*p*Will you please write me and direct your Letter to the care of *person_mentioned*William Taylor on *location_mentioned*Trinity*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, and and you will greatly oblige your friend and Hmble. Servt*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Barnett*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I will take Land for the debt—on either the *location_mentioned*Brasis */location_mentioned*or the *location_mentioned*Colorado*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Direct the Letters *person_mentioned*James Barnett*/person_mentioned**person_mentioned* Mentoco River*/person_mentioned* Care of *person_mentioned*Alexander McLane*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Bayou Que Tortoc*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
